document.full_text: the securities and exchange commission is probing former berkshire hathaway  executive david sokol, who has been under scrutiny for his trading in lubrizol , a person familiar with the matter said on wednesday.
document.title: sec probing ex-berkshire executive sokol: source
lines_and_colors: the securities and exchange commission is probing former berkshire hathaway  executive david sokol, who has been under scrutiny for his trading in lubrizol , a person familiar with the matter said on wednesday.
